title: Favorite Mexicorn Chip Dip
directions: Combine the corn, tomatoes, mayonnaise, and Cheddar cheese in a bowl until well blended. Cover and refrigerate until chilled.
ingredients: 2 (11 ounce) cans Mexican-style corn with red and green peppers, drained
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL)
